title: I Think supports should go mid, not bottom
body:
After watching and reading about the Nubrac vs NB3 i came to one conclusion.
* ** EDIT READ THE WHOLE POST BEFORE COMMENTING WITH YOUR OPINIONS **
* 

ALL Supports should go mid as the standard lanes and they should've been doing this for years
1. Going Mid allows the Support the ability to roam to both other lane rather then just mid.
2. It provides better objective control, with the changes to Rift/Dragon from past seasons this gain much importance
3. It allows the support to better react to invades and help his JG in crab battles
4. it provides better vision control 

>But but the ADC 1 v 2

I think the advantages of having a support mid are much more valuable then have one bot and that BOTH support should always start mid.
This is already the standard thing to do post laning phase in pro play. I honestly think this should be done during laning phase.

I will be playing support mid lane from now on because i think it's the correct thing to do.

P.S. Let me make one thing clear. I'm suggesting both ADCs and support go mid and that traditional mid laners go bot. I think this makes sense from both a strat perspective and would also help from a "fun" perspective in the long term as it makes it harder to counter pick the solo lanes when they're effectively playing the same lane and can lane swap bad matchups
